short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manually leave a bookmark on where you are on a page so you can come back at anytime knowing where you were.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Click on "Add Bookmark" and click anywhere on the page to add a bookmark.
Click on "Find Bookmark" if you already had a bookmark, and the page will scroll you to your bookmark
Click on the bookmark to hide it
Note: You can only have one bookmark at a time
